title: Plan Migration Guide: Upgrade & Downgrade
author: Ekobol Finance Team
image_alt: Plan flexibility and growth trajectory visualization
image_caption: Flexibly adjust your plan as your business scales.
p1: Ekobol offers flexible plans that adapt to your business lifecycle. Whether experiencing rapid growth or optimizing costs, upgrade or downgrade instantly with zero hassle and prorated billing.
p2: Choose the plan that matches your current business stage.
p3: Grow into more advanced features and lower fees.
li6_text: Remaining days of old plan credited to new plan
li7_text: Example: 15 days left on Basic ($0) → Upgrade to Partner ($99/mo)
p4: Reduce costs while maintaining core features.
li12_text: Review feature changes (some features may be removed)
li14_text: Downgrade takes effect at END of current billing cycle
h3_3_2: Why Wait Until End of Cycle?
li15_text: You keep paid features for full month you paid for
li17_text: Allows time to prepare for transition
li18_text: Example: Downgrade on Dec 10 → Still Partner until Dec 31 → Basic starts Jan 1
p5: Understand what changes with each plan.
li20_text: ✅ Calculate cost savings from lower revenue share %
li22_text: ⚠️ Export data that may become inaccessible (advanced reports)
li23_text: ⚠ ️Disconnect extra marketplaces if new plan has limits
li25_text: ⚠️ Consider if cost savings justify feature loss
li34_text: Fixed fee ($99-$499) becomes cheaper than high revenue share.
li35_text: Partner/Enterprise get 24h response vs 48h on Basic.
li36_text: Genetic algorithms, advanced forecasting only on higher plans.
li38_text: Sales dropped temporarily → Downgrade to save fixed fee.
li39_text: Reduced to single marketplace → Basic plan sufficient.
li40_text: Not ready for full commitment → Try Basic first.
li41_text: Unsure which plan fits? Contact sales team for consultation
li42_text: Technical migration questions? Support team handles setup
li43_text: Billing disputes? Finance team reviews within 24h
p11: Ekobol's flexible pricing adapts to your business journey. Scale up or down with confidence, knowing you're always optimized.
